name: Raocow's Kitty Cat Adventure
description:
This is a game made for Raocow's 2019 Advent Calendar.

It may not make the most sense to anyone who hasn't followed Raocow's content over the years, but you're still absolutely welcome to play!

And you can also check out the video of him playing it here:

It's based pretty heavily as well on Cat Planet by Sylvie, so go check her stuff out!
The Raocow sprite in the game is from SMBX 2.0, so go check out that project as well!

This is kind of an explore-y first person platformer thing?
Made in GZDoom so it's 3d-ish but with 2d art?
And it's got lots of references to video games and is full of cats?
Maybe that's something that's up your alley, and if it is maybe this is something that's up your alley.
And if that's the case feel free to download this and play this!

PS: I would like to give MacOS and Ubuntu downloads as well, but I just haven't gotten that exactly figured out yet.
PPS: The advanced download is for folks who are used to GZDoom, you can load those up the same way you would any normal IWAD for doom
PPPS: If you've played this and would be curious to see me run around an early revision of the game, you can do so here!
PPPPS: There's also a thread about this on Raocow's forum, the Talkhaus
